channel.title: % of drops lol
channel.description: ok so i have PI source but i found how to decide what the npcs drop but how do i add the drop rate like it just says for example 4151:1 no rate or anything

item.title: % of drops lol
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Syntax:

A:B    [tab]    C:D    [tab]    C:D    [tab]    C:D
E:F    [tab]    E:F     [tab]    E:F     [tab]    E:F

Variables:
A- The npc’s ID.
B - The drop rate, which is the amount of getting ANY drop from the NPC.
C - An item to be dropped.
D - The item’s amount.
E - Rare Item to be dropped, (Note, it must be on a newer line, or it will process it as a normal item.)
F - The rare item’s amount.

Read full topic

item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

it’s like,

NpcId:Rate of rare item dropped

for instancs, if i was going to use a man, it would look something like this

1:20 995 1000 995 1000
4151

Something like that
